structures

Class Particle

  • java.lang.Object
    • structures.CircularShape
      • structures.MovableCircularShape
        • structures.Particle

  • public class Particle
extends MovableCircularShape
    A small (pixel-sized) object that is used for the collision graphic effect.
    Author:
    Sean Lewis

    • Constructor Detail

      • Particle

        public Particle(int xPosition,
        int yPosition,
        double xSpeed,
        double ySpeed,
        java.awt.Color color)
        Creates a new Particle at the given position with the given velocity.
        Parameters:
        xPosition - the x coordinate
        yPosition - the y coordinate
        xSpeed - the magnitude of speed in the horizontal direction
        ySpeed - the magnitude of speed in the vertical direction
        color - the Color of the Particle

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(double dx,
        double dy,
        java.awt.Graphics g)
        Description copied from class: CircularShape
        Draws the shape with the shape's default color. This is the primary method for all drawing.
        Overrides:
        draw in class CircularShape
        Parameters:
        dx - a translation x-difference
        dy - a translation y-difference
        g - the Graphics component to draw with
